sections.name: My Financial Requirements
sections.description: If my Carer handles money on my behalf each transaction must be recorded on the Record of Financial Transaction form. My Carer is not allowed access information to my bank account, such as passwords and is not allowed to have the PIN number to my Credit/ Debit card.

questions.question: I'm able to handle all of my own financial transactions?
questions.fieldName: i'm able to handle all of my own financial transactions?

questions.question: I'm able to countersign all financial transactions undertaken on my behalf?
questions.fieldName: i'm able to countersign all financial transactions undertaken on my behalf?

questions.question: I need my Carer to handle money on my behalf?
questions.fieldName: i need my carer to handle money on my behalf?

sections.name: My Medication Needs
sections.description: Summarise directions for carers including actions identified by medication needs assessment below and how and when the Client takes their medication. Always refer to the MAR chart and complete / refer to PRN directions where relevant. Notify management immediately of: any changes to my medication, side effects, concerns, lack of clarity about medication or doses to give.

questions.question: Is carer support needed with any aspect of my medication?
questions.fieldName: is carer support needed with any aspect of my medication?

questions.question: Do you require support to apply creams?
questions.fieldName: do you require support to apply creams?

sections.name: My Medication Risk Assessment
sections.description: The assessor will make a decision regarding the level of risk related to medication support using answers to the above questions identifying any control measures that need to be implemented.

sections.name: My Agreed Safe Transfer Procedures
sections.description: It is essential that all of my Carers adhere to the following Moving & Handling transfer procedures at all times and report any difficulties to their line manager. Before any transfer is carried out please check that my environment is safe and equipment is in good working order.

sections.description: If you have had a fall in the last 12 months or answered
sections.Yes: to two or more questions in the test you must complete the falls risk assessment

sections.name: My Pressure sore prevention and skin integrity plan
sections.description: Summarise all support required (see list below). Record on the body map all areas at risk of pressure damage e.g. buttocks, elbows and ears, back of head, sacrum (buttocks), hips, shoulders, spine and toes. Inform branch office immediately with any concerns, skin tears or worsening of pressure areas.
sections.fieldName: my pressure sore prevention and skin integrity plan
